pageContext.claim: “My last speech was in Grand Rapids [in the 2016 campaign]. … And so, on no notice, we had 32,000 people show up. Right? ,,, And Hillary -- Crooked Hillary, as I call her -- she had a small gathering of about 400 people.”
pageContext.analysis: The Michigan venue where Trump rallied in the early morning hours of Election Day 2016 has a capacity of 4,200, far less than the 32,000 claimed by Trump. Hillary Clinton held a rally the same day at nearby Grand Valley State University; it was described as a “capacity crowd” at a venue that holds 4,100 people.
